text: 1:17 Daniel 7:14; Jon 1:18; Rom 16:27; Hibru 11:27; 1 Jon 4:12Ezɨ an Atrivir Zurara Itim. An oveghan kogham, ezɨ e gumazamiziba an ganighan kogham. A uabɨra bar guizbangɨn God. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, e zurazurara ziar ekiam a danɨng mamaghɨra ikɨ mɨkɨm suam, God nɨ bar ekevegha bar dera. Bar guizbangɨra.
